[docs]class MSPeak:
    def __init__(self):
        self.ms_spectra=[];
        self.parameters={};
        self.mz=0.0;
        self.intensity=0.0;
        self.number=0;
        self.parent_spectrum=None;


[docs]    def close(self):
        for spectrum in self.ms_spectra:
            spectrum.close();

        
    def __enter__(self):
        return self;

    def __exit__(self, exc_type, exc_value, traceback):
        self.close();
        

[docs]    def add_spectrum(self, spectrum):
        self.ms_spectra.append(spectrum);
        spectrum.parent_peak=self;
